name: Blu the Airmail Delivery Bird (PC, demo)
name_original: Blu the Airmail Delivery Bird (PC, demo)
description:
Blu the bird was just a regular bird. One night it seemed like his luck ran out when his home got blown away by a nasty storm. Things would soon change though, as he gets a new job as a paperboy at a nearby town...

This is a remake of my GB Studio game of the same name, only this time it's arcade-style. This will be my first commercial game.

So, what's new?

  • Random enemies! The enemies are no longer in a set pattern and spawn randomly.
  • Hit enemies with mail! This was a feature I should've implemented from the very beginning, honestly.
  • New rating system! Now you get a score depending on how well you did on each day. If you don't get at least a 60%, you'll lose the game.
  • Mobile support! Just hold your finger to the screen for a second to play the game on mobile.

What's coming in the final release?

  • Achievements!
  • Lots of unlockable goodies!
  • High scores!
  • More levels!
